result.text:
Think of an **LLM (Large Language Model)** as a super-powered version of the "autofill" feature on your smartphone.

To understand it simply, let’s break down the three words:

### 1. Large
These models are "large" in two ways. First, they have read almost everything on the public internet—millions of books, articles, websites, and computer code. Second, their internal "brain" (the computer network) is massive, allowing them to remember complex patterns.

### 2. Language
Their
